LocaleLayout.title: Sage Healthcare Platform - Your Trusted Gateway to Saudi Medical Care
LocaleLayout.description: Experience the perfect blend of healthcare expertise, cultural hospitality, and personalized service with Sage. We are dedicated to guiding you through every step of your medical journey.
LocaleLayout.keywords: healthcare, saudi arabia, medical tourism, treatment, hospitals, medical care

Hero.title: BUILDING BLOCKS
Hero.subtitle: TO EXCELLENCE
Hero.description: At Sage, we've redefined the construction process, crafting exceptional building solutions that exceed expectations. Our innovative approach ensures every project is delivered with unmatched quality and precision.
Hero.tagline: Every structure tells a story. Let us craft yours with excellence.

Testimonial.quote: Since its launch in 2021, Sage has transformed the construction industry with its innovative model of enhanced life projects and enhanced projects. Our outstanding leadership in construction is delivered right to the people.
Testimonial.author: Construction Excellence Team

GeneralContracting.title: GENERAL CONTRACTING
GeneralContracting.description: We provide comprehensive general contracting services, managing every aspect of your construction project from initial planning to final completion. Our experienced team ensures quality, safety, and timely delivery.
GeneralContracting.Author: Author
GeneralContracting.ScheduleOne: Schedule your one-on-one meeting with our experts to explore innovative solutions tailored to your needs.
GeneralContracting.NoData: No data available in this section.

Services.description: نقدم مجموعة شاملة من خدمات البناء، ينفذها محترفون ذوو خبرة عالية في مجالاتهم.

News.title: News & Insights
News.tipsDescription: Find curated travel advice from those who know Saudi best—insider tips, updates, and more.
News.discoverNews: Discover the latest news and events at Sage. We are committed to keeping you informed about advancements in healthcare and our services.
News.announcements: Stay updated with Sage's latest achievements and announcements.

Form.errorFirstName: First name must be at least 3 characters.
Form.errorLastName: Last name must be at least 3 characters.

CSR.title: Submit a Case for Review
CSR.description: Please provide the following information to help us understand your needs
CSR.briefDescription: Brief Description of medical history & current symptoms
CSR.provideDetail: Please provide as much detail as possible including duration and previous treatment
CSR.Initiative: Why are you seeking support from SAGE's CSR Initiative?
CSR.specificTourism: Explain your specific need for medical tourism or why your case is considered rare/complex
CSR.medicalReports: Are you able to provide medical reports and diagnostic images?
CSR.hearAbout: How did you hear about our CSR?
CSR.Approve: By submitting this form, I confirm that the information provided is accurate to the best of my knowledge and I understand that this application does not guarantee acceptance into the SAGE CSR program.
CSR.dedicated: Our dedicated team is reviewing it and will be in touch as soon as possible.
CSR.errorFullName: Full name must be at least 3 characters.
CSR.errorEmail: Please enter a valid email address
CSR.errorCountry: Please select your country of residence
CSR.errorPrimaryCondition: A minimum of 50 characters is required
CSR.errorBriefDescription: A minimum of 50 characters is required
